TransactionStateContext.DepositState: When users deposit Ether and the Deposit function is called.
TransactionStateContext.CashOutState: When users withdraw Ether via the CashOut function.

ExternalInteractions.Deposit: Transfers Ether from users to contract balances and logs the transfer.
ExternalInteractions.CashOut: Transfers Ether from contract balances to users if conditions are met and logs the withdrawal.
